title: Process Industry Simulation Training: Learning Transfer-Centered Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Team-based simulation training in smartphone-centric constrained technical environments. Learners acquire problem-solving skills via industry-mimicking scenarios and receive real-time feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively resolve emergency situations with 80% accuracy in a process industry simulation environment
Learners can reconstruct complex process procedures step-by-step in at least three practical sessions using simulation tools
Learners can self-assess their confidence level in applying acquired operational skills to real tasks at 4 points or higher (5-point scale) via post-training evaluation surveys

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
